sentences.sContent: Such cramming method of teaching is now severely reprobated.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such cramming method of teaching is now severely reprobated.
sentences.sCn: 这种填鸭式的教学法现在受到严厉的谴责。

sentences.sContent: Tip：If you’re planning a really long cramming session, break it up with a nap.
sentences.sContent_eng: Tip：If you’re planning a really long cramming session, break it up with a nap.
sentences.sCn: 小贴士：如果你正在计划一个很长的填鸭式的学期，中途可以打个盹。

synos.tran: 塞满；填鸭式的用功；挤满

phrases.pCn: 补习班；补习学校，强化学校
临时抱佛脚；填鸭式地学习；死记硬背
